sentences.sContent: The coupon entitles you to ten cents off your next purchase.
sentences.sCn: 这张优惠券可以让你在下次购物时节省10分钱。

synos.tran: [金融]息票；[贸易]赠券；联票；[经]配给券

trans.tranCn: 息票；赠券；联票；[经] 配给券
trans.tranOther: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free
